chat. I will need your help here in developing my school project application. I want to create a waste management system app(android using java) called(WasteReborn). This app will permit its users to book for waste pickup(depending on the days the waste pickup truck passes in their streets), make orders on the recycled products market place, allow the user's to track their pickup or orders. The admin would be able to manage user's, view orders and the total revenue they recycling company has made. Mark user's orders and waste pickup request as pending or complete. The admin, will also be able to add new recycled products into the platform(the picture, the discription and the price) which is then displayed to the user in the section where they can buy recycled products. I would also like the app to have an encouragement system(points) whereby, for every successfull waste pickup, the user gets five points from a hundred points upwards, they user would be able to claim a recycled product worth those number of points also based. it should have a search bar a notification system for both the user and the admin, a chat bot to help the user. A history system for the user to view his/her past transactions. and a review section that can pop up every two weeks so the user gives their experience and what they would want to be improved in the app. As for the payment medium, I would like to intergrate the mobile money or orange money API(for free) since I am just a student for now. As for my framework, I would like to use springboot and other good android frameworks you can recommend to me that will make the user have a nice user experience. For the database, would like to use postgresql. Please help me let's realize this project together. For my color I would like green for the logo and some button highlights and skyblue too for some highlights. as for text, it can be black on white background. Let's do this.

I can see you already have a solid foundation for your WasteReborn app. Let me analyze what's currently implemented and create a comprehensive plan to complete your vision.

## Current Implementation Analysis

Your app already has:
- ✅ Basic authentication system (Login/Signup)
- ✅ Navigation drawer with main sections
- ✅ Product marketplace with cart functionality
- ✅ Fragment-based architecture for different sections
- ✅ Basic UI structure for Home, Marketplace, Cart, etc.

## Comprehensive Development Plan

Based on your requirements, here's my detailed plan to transform WasteReborn into a complete waste management system:

### **Phase 1: Backend Infrastructure & Database Setup**
1. **Spring Boot Backend Setup**
 - Create Spring Boot project with PostgreSQL integration
 - Set up REST API endpoints
 - Implement JWT authentication
 - Create database models for users, orders, pickups, products, points, etc.

2. **Database Schema Design**
 - Users table (with role: USER/ADMIN)
 - Products table (recycled products)
 - Orders table (marketplace orders)
 - Pickup_Requests table (waste pickup bookings)
 - Points_System table (user rewards)
 - Notifications table
 - Reviews table
 - Chat_Messages table (for chatbot)

### **Phase 2: Enhanced Android App Features**
1. **User Management & Authentication**
 - Integrate with Spring Boot backend
 - Implement proper session management
 - Add user profile management

2. **Waste Pickup System**
 - Schedule pickup based on street/area
 - Track pickup status
 - Points reward system (5 points per successful pickup)

3. **Enhanced Marketplace**
 - Admin product management
 - Search functionality
 - Category filtering
 - Points-based purchasing

4. **Admin Panel**
 - User management
 - Order management
 - Revenue tracking
 - Product management (add/edit/delete)

5. **Additional Features**
 - Notification system
 - Chat bot integration
 - Order/pickup tracking
 - Transaction history
 - Review system (bi-weekly prompts)
 - Mobile money integration

### **Phase 3: UI/UX Enhancements**
1. **Color Scheme Implementation**
 - Green primary colors for logo and buttons
 - Sky blue accent colors
 - Black text on white background

2. **Modern Android Components**
 - Material Design 3
 - Improved navigation
 - Better user experience

Let me start implementing this plan. First, let's enhance your current Android dependencies and then work on the backend:

 18	public class ProductAdapter extends RecyclerView.Adapter<ProductAdapter.ProductViewHolder> {
 19	
 20	 private List<Product> productList;
 21	 private List<Product> fullProductList; // Unfiltered full list
 22	
 23	 public ProductAdapter(List<Product> list) {
 24	 this.productList = list;
 25	 this.fullProductList = new ArrayList<>(list); // Make a copy
 26	 }
 27	
 28	 @NonNull
 29	 @Override
 30	 public ProductViewHolder onCreateViewHolder(@NonNull ViewGroup parent, int viewType) {
 31	 View view = LayoutInflater.from(parent.getContext()).inflate(R.layout.item_product_card, parent, false);
 32	 return new ProductViewHolder(view);
 33	 }
 34	
 35	 @Override
 36	 public void onBindViewHolder(@NonNull ProductViewHolder holder, int position) {
 37	 Product product = productList.get(position);
 38	
 39	 holder.imageProduct.setImageResource(product.getImageResId());
 40	 holder.textProductName.setText(product.getName());
 41	 holder.textPrice.setText("FCFA " + product.getPrice());
 42	
 43	 holder.btnLike.setImageResource(product.isLiked() ? R.drawable.like : R.drawable.ic_like);
 44	 holder.btnLike.setOnClickListener(v -> {
 45	 product.setLiked(!product.isLiked());
 46	 notifyItemChanged(position);
 47	 });
 48	
 49	 holder.btnAddToCart.setOnClickListener(v -> {
 50	 CartManager.getInstance().addToCart(product);
 51	 Toast.makeText(v.getContext(), product.getName() + " added to cart!", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
 52	 });
 53	 }
 54	
 55	 @Override
 56	 public int getItemCount() {
 57	 return productList.size();
 58	 }
 59	
 60	 // Used externally to apply a full filtered list
 61	 public void setFilteredList(List<Product> filteredList) {
 62	 this.productList = filteredList;
 63	 notifyDataSetChanged();
 64	 }
 65	
 66	 // ✅ Method to filter based on category
 67	 public void updateFilter(String category) {
 68	 if (category.equalsIgnoreCase("All")) {
 69	 productList = new ArrayList<>(fullProductList);
 70	 } else {
 71	 List<Product> filtered = new ArrayList<>();
 72	 for (Product p : fullProductList) {
 73	 if (p.getCategory().equalsIgnoreCase(category)) {
 74	 filtered.add(p);
 75	 }
 76	 }
 77	 productList = filtered;
 78	 }
 79	 notifyDataSetChanged();
 80	 }

 6	public class CartManager {
 7	
 8	 private static CartManager instance;
 9	 private final List<Product> cartItems;
 10	
 11	 private CartManager() {
 12	 cartItems = new ArrayList<>();
 13	 }
 14	
 15	 public static CartManager getInstance() {
 16	 if (instance == null) {
 17	 instance = new CartManager();
 18	 }
 19	 return instance;
 20	 }
 21	
 22	 public void addToCart(Product product) {
 23	 cartItems.add(product);
 24	 }
 25	
 26	 public void removeFromCart(Product product) {
 27	 cartItems.remove(product);
 28	 }
 29	
 30	 public List<Product> getCartItems() {
 31	 return new ArrayList<>(cartItems); // Return a copy to avoid external modification
 32	 }
 33	
 34	 public void clearCart() {
 35	 cartItems.clear();
 36	 }
 37	
 38	 public int getTotalCost() {
 39	 int total = 0;
 40	 for (Product item : cartItems) {
 41	 total += item.getPrice();
 42	 }
 43	 return total;
 44	 }
 45	}

I can see you already have a solid foundation for your WasteReborn app. Let me analyze what's currently implemented and create a comprehensive plan to complete your vision.

## Current Implementation Analysis

Your app already has:
- ✅ Basic authentication system (Login/Signup)
- ✅ Navigation drawer with main sections
- ✅ Product marketplace with cart functionality
- ✅ Fragment-based architecture for different sections
- ✅ Basic UI structure for Home, Marketplace, Cart, etc.

## Comprehensive Development Plan

Based on your requirements, here's my detailed plan to transform WasteReborn into a complete waste management system:

### **Phase 1: Backend Infrastructure & Database Setup**
1. **Spring Boot Backend Setup**
 - Create Spring Boot project with PostgreSQL integration
 - Set up REST API endpoints
 - Implement JWT authentication
 - Create database models for users, orders, pickups, products, points, etc.

2. **Database Schema Design**
 - Users table (with role: USER/ADMIN)
 - Products table (recycled products)
 - Orders table (marketplace orders)
 - Pickup_Requests table (waste pickup bookings)
 - Points_System table (user rewards)
 - Notifications table
 - Reviews table
 - Chat_Messages table (for chatbot)

### **Phase 2: Enhanced Android App Features**
1. **User Management & Authentication**
 - Integrate with Spring Boot backend
 - Implement proper session management
 - Add user profile management

2. **Waste Pickup System**
 - Schedule pickup based on street/area
 - Track pickup status
 - Points reward system (5 points per successful pickup)

3. **Enhanced Marketplace**
 - Admin product management
 - Search functionality
 - Category filtering
 - Points-based purchasing

4. **Admin Panel**
 - User management
 - Order management
 - Revenue tracking
 - Product management (add/edit/delete)

5. **Additional Features**
 - Notification system
 - Chat bot integration
 - Order/pickup tracking
 - Transaction history
 - Review system (bi-weekly prompts)
 - Mobile money integration

### **Phase 3: UI/UX Enhancements**
1. **Color Scheme Implementation**
 - Green primary colors for logo and buttons
 - Sky blue accent colors
 - Black text on white background

2. **Modern Android Components**
 - Material Design 3
 - Improved navigation
 - Better user experience

Let me start implementing this plan. First, let's enhance your current Android dependencies and then work on the backend:

"file_content": "package com.wastereborn.security;\n\nimport com.wastereborn.service.UserService;\nimport jakarta.servlet.FilterChain;\nimport jakarta.servlet.ServletException;\nimport jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;\nimport jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;\nimport org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;\nimport org.springframework.security.authentication.UsernamePasswordAuthenticationToken;\nimport org.springframework.security.core.context.SecurityContextHolder;\nimport org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails;\nimport org.springframework.security.web.authentication.WebAuthenticationDetailsSource;\nimport org.springframework.stereotype.Component;\nimport org.springframework.web.filter.OncePerRequestFilter;\n\nimport java.io.IOException;\n\n@Component\npublic class JwtAuthenticationFilter extends OncePerRequestFilter {\n\n @Autowired\n private JwtTokenProvider tokenProvider;\n\n @Autowired\n private UserService userService;\n\n @Override\n protected void doFilterInternal(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, FilterChain filterChain)\n throws ServletException, IOException {\n\n String token = getTokenFromRequest(request);\n\n if (token != null && tokenProvider.validateToken(token)) {\n String email = tokenProvider.getEmailFromToken(token);\n\n UserDetails userDetails = userService.loadUserByUsername(email);\n UsernamePasswordAuthenticationToken authentication = \n new UsernamePasswordAuthenticationToken(userDetails, null, userDetails.getAuthorities());\n authentication.setDetails(new WebAuthenticationDetailsSource().buildDetails(request));\n\n SecurityContextHolder.getContext().setAuthentication(authentication);\n }\n\n filterChain.doFilter(request, response);\n }\n\n private String getTokenFromRequest(HttpServletRequest request) {\n String bearerToken = request.getHeader(\"Authorization\");\n if (bearerToken != null && bearerToken.startsWith(\"Bearer \")) {\n return bearerToken.substring(7);\n }\n return null;\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"Now let's create the JWT security configuration:

IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "backend/src/main/java/com/wastereborn/security/JwtTokenProvider.java", "file_content": "package com.wastereborn.security;\n\nimport io.jsonwebtoken.*;\nimport io.jsonwebtoken.security.Keys;\nimport org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;\nimport org.springframework.security.core.Authentication;\nimport org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails;\nimport org.springframework.stereotype.Component;\n\nimport javax.crypto.SecretKey;\nimport java.util.Date;\n\n@Component\npublic class JwtTokenProvider {\n\n @Value(\"${spring.security.jwt.secret-key}\")\n private String jwtSecret;\n\n @Value(\"${spring.security.jwt.expiration}\")\n private int jwtExpirationInMs;\n\n private SecretKey getSigningKey() {\n return Keys.hmacShaKeyFor(jwtSecret.getBytes());\n }\n\n public String generateToken(Authentication authentication) {\n UserDetails userPrincipal = (UserDetails) authentication.getPrincipal();\n\n Date expiryDate = new Date(System.currentTimeMillis() + jwtExpirationInMs);\n\n return Jwts.builder()\n .setSubject(userPrincipal.getUsername())\n .setIssuedAt(new Date())\n .setExpiration(expiryDate)\n .signWith(getSigningKey(), SignatureAlgorithm.HS512)\n .compact();\n }\n\n public String generateTokenFromEmail(String email) {\n Date expiryDate = new Date(System.currentTimeMillis() + jwtExpirationInMs);\n\n return Jwts.builder()\n .setSubject(email)\n .setIssuedAt(new Date())\n .setExpiration(expiryDate)\n .signWith(getSigningKey(), SignatureAlgorithm.HS512)\n .compact();\n }\n\n public String getEmailFromToken(String token) {\n Claims claims = Jwts.parserBuilder()\n .setSigningKey(getSigningKey())\n .build()\n .parseClaimsJws(token)\n .getBody();\n\n return claims.getSubject();\n }\n\n public boolean validateToken(String authToken) {\n try {\n Jwts.parserBuilder()\n .setSigningKey(getSigningKey())\n .build()\n .parseClaimsJws(authToken);\n return true;\n } catch (SecurityException ex) {\n System.err.println(\"Invalid JWT signature\");\n } catch (MalformedJwtException ex) {\n System.err.println(\"Invalid JWT token\");\n } catch (ExpiredJwtException ex) {\n System.err.println(\"Expired JWT token\");\n } catch (UnsupportedJwtException ex) {\n System.err.println(\"Unsupported JWT token\");\n } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {\n System.err.println(\"JWT claims string is empty\");\n }\n return false;\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "backend/src/main/java/com/wastereborn/config/SecurityConfig.java", "file_content": "package com.wastereborn.config;\n\nimport com.wastereborn.security.JwtAuthenticationFilter;\nimport org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;\nimport org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean;\nimport org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration;\nimport org.springframework.security.authentication.AuthenticationManager;\nimport org.springframework.security.authentication.dao.DaoAuthenticationProvider;\nimport org.springframework.security.config.annotation.authentication.configuration.AuthenticationConfiguration;\nimport org.springframework.security.config.annotation.method.configuration.EnableMethodSecurity;\nimport org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.builders.HttpSecurity;\nimport org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.configuration.EnableWebSecurity;\nimport org.springframework.security.config.http.SessionCreationPolicy;\nimport org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService;\nimport org.springframework.security.crypto.bcrypt.BCryptPasswordEncoder;\nimport org.springframework.security.crypto.password.PasswordEncoder;\nimport org.springframework.security.web.SecurityFilterChain;\nimport org.springframework.security.web.authentication.UsernamePasswordAuthenticationFilter;\nimport org.springframework.web.cors.CorsConfiguration;\nimport org.springframework.web.cors.CorsConfigurationSource;\nimport org.springframework.web.cors.UrlBasedCorsConfigurationSource;\n\nimport java.util.Arrays;\n\n@Configuration\n@EnableWebSecurity\n@EnableMethodSecurity(prePostEnabled = true)\npublic class SecurityConfig {\n\n @Autowired\n private UserDetailsService userDetailsService;\n\n @Autowired\n private JwtAuthenticationFilter jwtAuthenticationFilter;\n\n @Bean\n public PasswordEncoder passwordEncoder() {\n return new BCryptPasswordEncoder();\n }\n\n @Bean\n public DaoAuthenticationProvider authenticationProvider() {\n DaoAuthenticationProvider authProvider = new DaoAuthenticationProvider();\n authProvider.setUserDetailsService(userDetailsService);\n authProvider.setPasswordEncoder(passwordEncoder());\n return authProvider;\n }\n\n @Bean\n public AuthenticationManager authenticationManager(AuthenticationConfiguration config) throws Exception {\n return config.getAuthenticationManager();\n }\n\n @Bean\n public SecurityFilterChain filterChain(HttpSecurity http) throws Exception {\n http.cors().and().csrf().disable()\n .sessionManagement().sessionCreationPolicy(SessionCreationPolicy.STATELESS)\n .and()\n .authorizeHttpRequests(authz -> authz\n .requestMatchers(\"/auth/**\").permitAll()\n .requestMatchers(\"/products/public/**\").permitAll()\n .requestMatchers(\"/admin/**\").hasRole(\"ADMIN\")\n .anyRequest().authenticated()\n );\n\n http.authenticationProvider(authenticationProvider());\n http.addFilterBefore(jwtAuthenticationFilter, UsernamePasswordAuthenticationFilter.class);\n\n return http.build();\n }\n\n @Bean\n public CorsConfigurationSource corsConfigurationSource() {\n CorsConfiguration configuration = new CorsConfiguration();\n configuration.setAllowedOriginPatterns(Arrays.asList(\"*\"));\n configuration.setAllowedMethods(Arrays.asList(\"GET\", \"POST\", \"PUT\", \"DELETE\", \"OPTIONS\"));\n configuration.setAllowedHeaders(Arrays.asList(\"*\"));\n configuration.setAllowCredentials(true);\n \n UrlBasedCorsConfigurationSource source = new UrlBasedCorsConfigurationSource();\n source.registerCorsConfiguration(\"/**\", configuration);\n return source;\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "backend/src/main/java/com/wastereborn/service/UserService.java", "file_content": "package com.wastereborn.service;\n\nimport com.wastereborn.model.User;\nimport com.wastereborn.repository.UserRepository;\nimport org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;\nimport org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails;\nimport org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService;\nimport org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException;\nimport org.springframework.security.crypto.password.PasswordEncoder;\nimport org.springframework.stereotype.Service;\n\nimport java.util.List;\nimport java.util.Optional;\n\n@Service\npublic class UserService implements UserDetailsService {\n\n @Autowired\n private UserRepository userRepository;\n\n @Autowired\n private PasswordEncoder passwordEncoder;\n\n @Override\n public UserDetails loadUserByUsername(String email) throws UsernameNotFoundException {\n User user = userRepository.findByEmail(email)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new UsernameNotFoundException(\"User not found with email: \" + email));\n return user;\n }\n\n public User createUser(User user) {\n if (userRepository.existsByEmail(user.getEmail())) {\n throw new RuntimeException(\"Email is already taken!\");\n }\n if (userRepository.existsByPhoneNumber(user.getPhoneNumber())) {\n throw new RuntimeException(\"Phone number is already taken!\");\n }\n\n user.setPassword(passwordEncoder.encode(user.getPassword()));\n return userRepository.save(user);\n }\n\n public Optional<User> findByEmail(String email) {\n return userRepository.findByEmail(email);\n }\n\n public Optional<User> findById(Long id) {\n return userRepository.findById(id);\n }\n\n public List<User> getAllUsers() {\n return userRepository.findAll();\n }\n\n public List<User> getUsersByRole(User.Role role) {\n return userRepository.findByRole(role);\n }\n\n public User updateUser(User user) {\n return userRepository.save(user);\n }\n\n public void deleteUser(Long id) {\n userRepository.deleteById(id);\n }\n\n public User addPoints(Long userId, Integer points) {\n User user = userRepository.findById(userId)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"User not found\"));\n user.setPointsBalance(user.getPointsBalance() + points);\n return userRepository.save(user);\n }\n\n public User deductPoints(Long userId, Integer points) {\n User user = userRepository.findById(userId)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"User not found\"));\n if (user.getPointsBalance() < points) {\n throw new RuntimeException(\"Insufficient points\");\n }\n user.setPointsBalance(user.getPointsBalance() - points);\n return userRepository.save(user);\n }\n\n public List<User> getTopUsersByPoints() {\n return userRepository.findTopUsersByPoints();\n }\n\n public List<User> getUsersByStreet(String street) {\n return userRepository.findByStreet(street);\n }\n\n public List<User> getUsersByCity(String city) {\n return userRepository.findByCity(city);\n }\n\n public User updateUserProfile(Long userId, User updatedUser) {\n User user = userRepository.findById(userId)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"User not found\"));\n \n user.setFirstName(updatedUser.getFirstName());\n user.setLastName(updatedUser.getLastName());\n user.setPhoneNumber(updatedUser.getPhoneNumber());\n user.setAddress(updatedUser.getAddress());\n user.setStreet(updatedUser.getStreet());\n user.setCity(updatedUser.getCity());\n \n return userRepository.save(user);\n }\n\n public void updateUserStats(Long userId, boolean isOrder, boolean isPickup) {\n User user = userRepository.findById(userId)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"User not found\"));\n \n if (isOrder) {\n user.setTotalOrders(user.getTotalOrders() + 1);\n }\n \n if (isPickup) {\n user.setTotalPickups(user.getTotalPickups() + 1);\n // Calculate recycling percentage (this is a simple calculation, you can make it more sophisticated)\n double percentage = (user.getTotalPickups() * 10.0); // Each pickup contributes 10% (max 100%)\n user.setRecyclingPercentage(Math.min(percentage, 100.0));\n }\n \n userRepository.save(user);\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"Now let's create the services:

IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "backend/src/main/java/com/wastereborn/service/ProductService.java", "file_content": "package com.wastereborn.service;\n\nimport com.wastereborn.model.Product;\nimport com.wastereborn.model.User;\nimport com.wastereborn.repository.ProductRepository;\nimport org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;\nimport org.springframework.stereotype.Service;\n\nimport java.util.List;\nimport java.util.Optional;\n\n@Service\npublic class ProductService {\n\n @Autowired\n private ProductRepository productRepository;\n\n public List<Product> getAllProducts() {\n return productRepository.findAll();\n }\n\n public List<Product> getAvailableProducts() {\n return productRepository.findAvailableProducts();\n }\n\n public List<Product> getProductsByCategory(String category) {\n return productRepository.findByCategoryAndAvailable(category);\n }\n\n public List<Product> getPointsRedeemableProducts() {\n return productRepository.findPointsRedeemableProducts();\n }\n\n public List<Product> searchProducts(String keyword) {\n return productRepository.searchProducts(keyword);\n }\n\n public List<String> getCategories() {\n return productRepository.findDistinctCategories();\n }\n\n public Optional<Product> getProductById(Long id) {\n return productRepository.findById(id);\n }\n\n public Product createProduct(Product product, User createdBy) {\n product.setCreatedBy(createdBy);\n return productRepository.save(product);\n }\n\n public Product updateProduct(Long id, Product updatedProduct) {\n Product product = productRepository.findById(id)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Product not found\"));\n\n product.setName(updatedProduct.getName());\n product.setDescription(updatedProduct.getDescription());\n product.setCategory(updatedProduct.getCategory());\n product.setPrice(updatedProduct.getPrice());\n product.setPointsPrice(updatedProduct.getPointsPrice());\n product.setImageUrl(updatedProduct.getImageUrl());\n product.setStockQuantity(updatedProduct.getStockQuantity());\n product.setIsAvailable(updatedProduct.getIsAvailable());\n product.setIsPointsRedeemable(updatedProduct.getIsPointsRedeemable());\n\n return productRepository.save(product);\n }\n\n public void deleteProduct(Long id) {\n productRepository.deleteById(id);\n }\n\n public Product updateStock(Long productId, Integer quantity) {\n Product product = productRepository.findById(productId)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Product not found\"));\n\n product.setStockQuantity(product.getStockQuantity() + quantity);\n return productRepository.save(product);\n }\n\n public Product reduceStock(Long productId, Integer quantity) {\n Product product = productRepository.findById(productId)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Product not found\"));\n\n if (product.getStockQuantity() < quantity) {\n throw new RuntimeException(\"Insufficient stock\");\n }\n\n product.setStockQuantity(product.getStockQuantity() - quantity);\n return productRepository.save(product);\n }\n\n public Product toggleAvailability(Long productId) {\n Product product = productRepository.findById(productId)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Product not found\"));\n\n product.setIsAvailable(!product.getIsAvailable());\n return productRepository.save(product);\n }\n\n public Product togglePointsRedeemable(Long productId) {\n Product product = productRepository.findById(productId)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Product not found\"));\n\n product.setIsPointsRedeemable(!product.getIsPointsRedeemable());\n return productRepository.save(product);\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File }\n public void setToken(String token) { this.token = token; }\n \n public String getType() { return type; }\n public void setType(String type) { this.type = type; }\n \n public Long getId() { return id; }\n public void setId(Long id) { this.id = id; }\n \n public String getEmail() { return email; }\n public void setEmail(String email) { this.email = email; }\n \n public String getFirstName() { return firstName; }\n public void setFirstName(String firstName) { this.firstName = firstName; }\n \n public String getLastName() { return lastName; }\n public void setLastName(String lastName) { this.lastName = lastName; }\n \n public String getPhoneNumber() { return phoneNumber; }\n public void setPhoneNumber(String phoneNumber) { this.phoneNumber = phoneNumber; }\n \n public String getRole() { return role; }\n public void setRole(String role) { this.role = role; }\n \n public Integer getPointsBalance() { return pointsBalance; }\n public void setPointsBalance(Integer pointsBalance) { this.pointsBalance = pointsBalance; }\n \n public Integer getTotalOrders() { return totalOrders; }\n public void setTotalOrders(Integer totalOrders) { this.totalOrders = totalOrders; }\n \n public Integer getTotalPickups() { return totalPickups; }\n public void setTotalPickups(Integer totalPickups) { this.totalPickups = totalPickups; }\n \n public Double getRecyclingPercentage() { return recyclingPercentage; }\n public void setRecyclingPercentage(Double recyclingPercentage) { this.recyclingPercentage = recyclingPercentage; }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File saved. IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "backend/src/main/java/com/wastereborn/controller/AuthController.java", "file_content": "package com.wastereborn.controller;\n\nimport com.wastereborn.dto.JwtResponse;\nimport com.wastereborn.dto.LoginRequest;\nimport com.wastereborn.dto.SignupRequest;\nimport com.wastereborn.model.User;\nimport com.wastereborn.security.JwtTokenProvider;\nimport com.wastereborn.service.UserService;\nimport jakarta.validation.Valid;\nimport org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;\nimport org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;\nimport org.springframework.security.authentication.AuthenticationManager;\nimport org.springframework.security.authentication.UsernamePasswordAuthenticationToken;\nimport org.springframework.security.core.Authentication;\nimport org.springframework.security.core.context.SecurityContextHolder;\nimport org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.*;\n\n@RestController\n@RequestMapping(\"/auth\")\n@CrossOrigin(origins = \"*\", maxAge = 3600)\npublic class AuthController {\n\n @Autowired\n private AuthenticationManager authenticationManager;\n\n @Autowired\n private UserService userService;\n\n @Autowired\n private JwtTokenProvider tokenProvider;\n\n @PostMapping(\"/login\")\n public ResponseEntity<?> authenticateUser(@Valid @RequestBody LoginRequest loginRequest) {\n try {\n Authentication authentication = authenticationManager.authenticate(\n new UsernamePasswordAuthenticationToken(\n loginRequest.getEmail(),\n loginRequest.getPassword()\n )\n );\n\n SecurityContextHolder.getContext().setAuthentication(authentication);\n String jwt = tokenProvider.generateToken(authentication);\n\n User user = (User) authentication.getPrincipal();\n \n return ResponseEntity.ok(new JwtResponse(jwt, user));\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return ResponseEntity.badRequest()\n .body(new MessageResponse(\"Error: Invalid email or password!\"));\n }\n }\n\n @PostMapping(\"/signup\")\n public ResponseEntity<?> registerUser(@Valid @RequestBody SignupRequest signUpRequest) {\n try {\n // Create new user\n User user = new User(\n signUpRequest.getFirstName(),\n signUpRequest.getLastName(),\n signUpRequest.getEmail(),\n signUpRequest.getPhoneNumber(),\n signUpRequest.getPassword()\n );\n\n user.setAddress(signUpRequest.getAddress());\n user.setStreet(signUpRequest.getStreet());\n user.setCity(signUpRequest.getCity());\n\n User savedUser = userService.createUser(user);\n\n // Generate JWT token\n String jwt = tokenProvider.generateTokenFromEmail(savedUser.getEmail());\n\n return ResponseEntity.ok(new JwtResponse(jwt, savedUser));\n } catch (RuntimeException e) {\n return ResponseEntity.badRequest()\n .body(new MessageResponse(\"Error: \" + e.getMessage()));\n }\n }\n\n @GetMapping(\"/validate\")\n public ResponseEntity<?> validateToken(@RequestHeader(\"Authorization\") String token) {\n try {\n if (token.startsWith(\"Bearer \")) {\n token = token.substring(7);\n }\n \n if (tokenProvider.validateToken(token)) {\n String email = tokenProvider.getEmailFromToken(token);\n User user = userService.findByEmail(email)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"User not found\"));\n \n return ResponseEntity.ok(new JwtResponse(token, user));\n } else {\n return ResponseEntity.badRequest()\n .body(new MessageResponse(\"Error: Invalid token!\"));\n }\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return ResponseEntity.badRequest()\n .body(new MessageResponse(\"Error: \" + e.getMessage()));\n }\n }\n\n // Inner class for message responses\n public static class MessageResponse {\n private String message;\n\n public MessageResponse(String message) {\n this.message = message;\n }\n\n public String getMessage() {\n return message;\n }\n\n public void setMessage(String message) {\n this.message = message;\n }\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"Now let's create the main controllers:

IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "backend/src/main/java/com/wastereborn/controller/ProductController.java", "file_content": "package com.wastereborn.controller;\n\nimport com.wastereborn.model.Product;\nimport com.wastereborn.model.User;\nimport com.wastereborn.service.ProductService;\nimport com.wastereborn.service.UserService;\nimport org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;\nimport org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;\nimport org.springframework.security.access.prepost.PreAuthorize;\nimport org.springframework.security.core.Authentication;\nimport org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.*;\n\nimport java.util.List;\n\n@RestController\n@RequestMapping(\"/products\")\n@CrossOrigin(origins = \"*\", maxAge = 3600)\npublic class ProductController {\n\n @Autowired\n private ProductService productService;\n\n @Autowired\n private UserService userService;\n\n @GetMapping(\"/public/all\")\n public ResponseEntity<List<Product>> getAllProducts() {\n return ResponseEntity.ok(productService.getAvailableProducts());\n }\n\n @GetMapping(\"/public/categories\")\n public ResponseEntity<List<String>> getCategories() {\n return ResponseEntity.ok(productService.getCategories());\n }\n\n @GetMapping(\"/public/category/{category}\")\n public ResponseEntity<List<Product>> getProductsByCategory(@PathVariable String category) {\n return ResponseEntity.ok(productService.getProductsByCategory(category));\n }\n\n @GetMapping(\"/public/search\")\n public ResponseEntity<List<Product>> searchProducts(@RequestParam String keyword) {\n return ResponseEntity.ok(productService.searchProducts(keyword));\n }\n\n @GetMapping(\"/public/{id}\")\n public ResponseEntity<Product> getProductById(@PathVariable Long id) {\n return productService.getProductById(id)\n .map(ResponseEntity::ok)\n .orElse(ResponseEntity.notFound().build());\n }\n\n @GetMapping(\"/points-redeemable\")\n public ResponseEntity<List<Product>> getPointsRedeemableProducts() {\n return ResponseEntity.ok(productService.getPointsRedeemableProducts());\n }\n\n @PostMapping\n @PreAuthorize(\"hasRole('ADMIN')\")\n public ResponseEntity<Product> createProduct(@RequestBody Product product, Authentication authentication) {\n User user = userService.findByEmail(authentication.getName())\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"User not found\"));\n \n Product createdProduct = productService.createProduct(product, user);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(createdProduct);\n }\n\n @PutMapping(\"/{id}\")\n @PreAuthorize(\"hasRole('ADMIN')\")\n public ResponseEntity<Product> updateProduct(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody Product product) {\n try {\n Product updatedProduct = productService.updateProduct(id, product);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(updatedProduct);\n } catch (RuntimeException e) {\n return ResponseEntity.notFound().build();\n }\n }\n\n @DeleteMapping(\"/{id}\")\n @PreAuthorize(\"hasRole('ADMIN')\")\n public ResponseEntity<?> deleteProduct(@PathVariable Long id) {\n try {\n productService.deleteProduct(id);\n return ResponseEntity.ok().build();\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return ResponseEntity.notFound().build();\n }\n }\n\n @PutMapping(\"/{id}/stock\")\n @PreAuthorize(\"hasRole('ADMIN')\")\n public ResponseEntity<Product> updateStock(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestParam Integer quantity) {\n try {\n Product updatedProduct = productService.updateStock(id, quantity);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(updatedProduct);\n } catch (RuntimeException e) {\n return ResponseEntity.badRequest().build();\n }\n }\n\n @PutMapping(\"/{id}/toggle-availability\")\n @PreAuthorize(\"hasRole('ADMIN')\")\n public ResponseEntity<Product> toggleAvailability(@PathVariable Long id) {\n try {\n Product updatedProduct = productService.toggleAvailability(id);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(updatedProduct);\n } catch (RuntimeException e) {\n return ResponseEntity.notFound().build();\n }\n }\n\n @PutMapping(\"/{id}/toggle-points-redeemable\")\n @PreAuthorize(\"hasRole('ADMIN')\")\n public ResponseEntity<Product> togglePointsRedeemable(@PathVariable Long id) {\n try {\n Product updatedProduct = productService.togglePointsRedeemable(id);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(updatedProduct);\n } catch (RuntimeException e) {\n return ResponseEntity.notFound().build();\n }\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "app/src/main/java/com/example/wastereborn/api/ApiService.java", "file_content": "package com.example.wastereborn.api;\n\nimport com.example.wastereborn.model.LoginRequest;\nimport com.example.wastereborn.model.SignupRequest;\nimport com.example.wastereborn.model.JwtResponse;\nimport com.example.wastereborn.model.ApiResponse;\nimport com.example.wastereborn.model.ProductResponse;\n\nimport java.util.List;\n\nimport retrofit2.Call;\nimport retrofit2.http.*;\n\npublic interface ApiService {\n \n // Authentication endpoints\n @POST(\"auth/login\")\n Call<JwtResponse> login(@Body LoginRequest loginRequest);\n \n @POST(\"auth/signup\")\n Call<JwtResponse> signup(@Body SignupRequest signupRequest);\n \n @GET(\"auth/validate\")\n Call<JwtResponse> validateToken(@Header(\"Authorization\") String token);\n \n // Product endpoints\n @GET(\"products/public/all\")\n Call<List<ProductResponse>> getAllProducts();\n \n @GET(\"products/public/categories\")\n Call<List<String>> getCategories();\n \n @GET(\"products/public/category/{category}\")\n Call<List<ProductResponse>> getProductsByCategory(@Path(\"category\") String category);\n \n @GET(\"products/public/search\")\n Call<List<ProductResponse>> searchProducts(@Query(\"keyword\") String keyword);\n \n @GET(\"products/public/{id}\")\n Call<ProductResponse> getProductById(@Path(\"id\") Long id);\n \n @GET(\"products/points-redeemable\")\n Call<List<ProductResponse>> getPointsRedeemableProducts(@Header(\"Authorization\") String token);\n \n // User endpoints\n @GET(\"users/profile\")\n Call<JwtResponse> getUserProfile(@Header(\"Authorization\") String token);\n \n @PUT(\"users/profile\")\n Call<JwtResponse> updateUserProfile(@Header(\"Authorization\") String token, @Body SignupRequest updateRequest);\n \n // Pickup endpoints\n @POST(\"pickups\")\n Call<ApiResponse> createPickupRequest(@Header(\"Authorization\") String token, @Body Object pickupRequest);\n \n @GET(\"pickups/user\")\n Call<List<Object>> getUserPickups(@Header(\"Authorization\") String token);\n \n @GET(\"pickups/{id}\")\n Call<Object> getPickupById(@Header(\"Authorization\") String token, @Path(\"id\") Long id);\n \n // Order endpoints\n @POST(\"orders\")\n Call<ApiResponse> createOrder(@Header(\"Authorization\") String token, @Body Object orderRequest);\n \n @GET(\"orders/user\")\n Call<List<Object>> getUserOrders(@Header(\"Authorization\") String token);\n \n @GET(\"orders/{id}\")\n Call<Object> getOrderById(@Header(\"Authorization\") String token, @Path(\"id\") Long id);\n \n // Admin endpoints\n @GET(\"admin/users\")\n Call<List<JwtResponse>> getAllUsers(@Header(\"Authorization\") String token);\n \n @GET(\"admin/orders\")\n Call<List<Object>> getAllOrders(@Header(\"Authorization\") String token);\n \n @GET(\"admin/pickups\")\n Call<List<Object>> getAllPickups(@Header(\"Authorization\") String token);\n \n @GET(\"admin/revenue\")\n Call<Object> getRevenue(@Header(\"Authorization\") String token);\n \n @POST(\"products\")\n Call<ProductResponse> createProduct(@Header(\"Authorization\") String token, @Body ProductResponse product);\n \n @PUT(\"products/{id}\")\n Call<ProductResponse> updateProduct(@Header(\"Authorization\") String token, @Path(\"id\") Long id, @Body ProductResponse product);\n \n @DELETE(\"products/{id}\")\n Call<ApiResponse> deleteProduct(@Header(\"Authorization\") String token, @Path(\"id\") Long id);\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"Now let's enhance the Android app to integrate with our backend. IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "app/src/main/java/com/example/wastereborn/utils/SessionManager.java", "file_content": "package com.example.wastereborn.utils;\n\nimport android.content.Context;\nimport android.content.SharedPreferences;\nimport com.example.wastereborn.model.JwtResponse;\n\npublic class SessionManager {\n \n private static final String PREF_NAME = \"WasteRebornSession\";\n private static final String KEY_TOKEN = \"token\";\n private static final String KEY_USER_ID = \"user_id\";\n private static final String KEY_EMAIL = \"email\";\n private static final String KEY_FIRST_NAME = \"first_name\";\n private static final String KEY_LAST_NAME = \"last_name\";\n private static final String KEY_PHONE = \"phone\";\n private static final String KEY_ROLE = \"role\";\n private static final String KEY_POINTS = \"points\";\n private static final String KEY_TOTAL_ORDERS = \"total_orders\";\n private static final String KEY_TOTAL_PICKUPS = \"total_pickups\";\n private static final String KEY_RECYCLING_PERCENTAGE = \"recycling_percentage\";\n private static final String KEY_IS_LOGGED_IN = \"is_logged_in\";\n \n private SharedPreferences pref;\n private SharedPreferences.Editor editor;\n private Context context;\n \n public SessionManager(Context context) {\n this.context = context;\n pref = context.getSharedPreferences(PREF_NAME, Context.MODE_PRIVATE);\n editor = pref.edit();\n }\n \n public void saveUserSession(JwtResponse user) {\n editor.putString(KEY_TOKEN, user.getToken());\n editor.putLong(KEY_USER_ID, user.getId());\n editor.putString(KEY_EMAIL, user.getEmail());\n editor.putString(KEY_FIRST_NAME, user.getFirstName());\n editor.putString(KEY_LAST_NAME, user.getLastName());\n editor.putString(KEY_PHONE, user.getPhoneNumber());\n editor.putString(KEY_ROLE, user.getRole());\n editor.putInt(KEY_POINTS, user.getPointsBalance() != null ? user.getPointsBalance() : 0);\n editor.putInt(KEY_TOTAL_ORDERS, user.getTotalOrders() != null ? user.getTotalOrders() : 0);\n editor.putInt(KEY_TOTAL_PICKUPS, user.getTotalPickups() != null ? user.getTotalPickups() : 0);\n editor.putFloat(KEY_RECYCLING_PERCENTAGE, user.getRecyclingPercentage() != null ? user.getRecyclingPercentage().floatValue() : 0.0f);\n editor.putBoolean(KEY_IS_LOGGED_IN, true);\n editor.apply();\n }\n \n public JwtResponse getUserSession() {\n if (!isLoggedIn()) {\n return null;\n }\n \n JwtResponse user = new JwtResponse();\n user.setToken(pref.getString(KEY_TOKEN, null));\n user.setId(pref.getLong(KEY_USER_ID, 0));\n user.setEmail(pref.getString(KEY_EMAIL, null));\n user.setFirstName(pref.getString(KEY_FIRST_NAME, null));\n user.setLastName(pref.getString(KEY_LAST_NAME, null));\n user.setPhoneNumber(pref.getString(KEY_PHONE, null));\n user.setRole(pref.getString(KEY_ROLE, null));\n user.setPointsBalance(pref.getInt(KEY_POINTS, 0));\n user.setTotalOrders(pref.getInt(KEY_TOTAL_ORDERS, 0));\n user.setTotalPickups(pref.getInt(KEY_TOTAL_PICKUPS, 0));\n user.setRecyclingPercentage((double) pref.getFloat(KEY_RECYCLING_PERCENTAGE, 0.0f));\n \n return user;\n }\n \n public String getToken() {\n return pref.getString(KEY_TOKEN, null);\n }\n \n public String getAuthHeader() {\n String token = getToken();\n return token != null ? \"Bearer \" + token : null;\n }\n \n public boolean isLoggedIn() {\n return pref.getBoolean(KEY_IS_LOGGED_IN, false);\n }\n \n public boolean isAdmin() {\n return \"ADMIN\".equals(pref.getString(KEY_ROLE, \"USER\"));\n }\n \n public void updateUserStats(int points, int orders, int pickups, double recyclingPercentage) {\n editor.putInt(KEY_POINTS, points);\n editor.putInt(KEY_TOTAL_ORDERS, orders);\n editor.putInt(KEY_TOTAL_PICKUPS, pickups);\n editor.putFloat(KEY_RECYCLING_PERCENTAGE, (float) recyclingPercentage);\n editor.apply();\n }\n \n public void logout() {\n editor.clear();\n editor.apply();\n }\n \n public String getUserName() {\n String firstName = pref.getString(KEY_FIRST_NAME, \"\");\n String lastName = pref.getString(KEY_LAST_NAME, \"\");\n return (firstName + \" \" + lastName).trim();\n }\n \n public String getUserInitial() {\n String firstName = pref.getString(KEY_FIRST_NAME, \"\");\n return firstName.isEmpty() ? \"U\" : firstName.substring(0, 1).toUpperCase();\n }\n \n public int getPointsBalance() {\n return pref.getInt(KEY_POINTS, 0);\n }\n \n public int getTotalOrders() {\n return pref.getInt(KEY_TOTAL_ORDERS, 0);\n }\n \n public int getTotalPickups() {\n return pref.getInt(KEY_TOTAL_PICKUPS, 0);\n }\n \n public double getRecyclingPercentage() {\n return pref.getFloat(KEY_RECYCLING_PERCENTAGE, 0.0f);\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"Now let's create a session manager to handle user authentication:

editPassword.getText().toString().trim();\n\n // Validation\n if (email.isEmpty()) {\n editEmail.setError(\"Email is required\");\n editEmail.requestFocus();\n return;\n }\n\n if (!Patterns.EMAIL_ADDRESS.matcher(email).matches()) {\n editEmail.setError(\"Please enter a valid email\");\n editEmail.requestFocus();\n return;\n }\n\n if (password.isEmpty()) {\n  41	
 42	 SecurityContextHolder.getContext().setAuthentication(authentication);

 44	
 45	 User user = (User) authentication.getPrincipal();
 46	 
 47	 return ResponseEntity.ok(new JwtResponse(jwt, user));
 48	 } catch (Exception e) {

 51	 }
 52	 }

 77	 return ResponseEntity.badRequest()
 78	 .body(new MessageResponse("Error: " + e.getMessage()));
 79	 }

 28	 protected void doFilterInternal(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, FilterChain filterChain)
 29	 throws ServletException, IOException {
 30	
 31	 String token = getTokenFromRequest(request);
 32	
 33	 if (token != null && tokenProvider.validateToken(token)) {
 34	 String email = tokenProvider.getEmailFromToken(token);
 35	
 36	 UserDetails userDetails = userService.loadUserByUsername(email);
 37	 UsernamePasswordAuthenticationToken authentication = 
 38	 new UsernamePasswordAuthenticationToken(userDetails, null, userDetails.getAuthorities());
 39	 authentication.setDetails(new WebAuthenticationDetailsSource().buildDetails(request));
 40	
 41	 SecurityContextHolder.getContext().setAuthentication(authentication);
 42	 }
 43	
 44	 filterChain.doFilter(request, response);
 45	 }

editOtherLocation.getText().toString().trim()\n : selectedLocation;\n\n // Validation\n if (name.isEmpty()) {\n editName.setError(\"Name is required\");\n return;\n }\n\n if (email.isEmpty() || !Patterns.EMAIL_ADDRESS.matcher(email).matches()) {\n editEmail.setError(\"Valid email is required\");\n return;\n }\n\n if (password.isEmpty() || password.length() < 6) {\n editPassword.setError(\"Password must be at least 6 characters\");\n return;\n }\n\n if (!password.equals(confirmPassword)) {\n editConfirmPassword.setError(\"Passwords do not match\");\n return;\n }\n\n if (selectedLocation.equals(\"Choose location\")) {\n Toast.makeText(getContext(), \"Please select a valid location\", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();\n return;\n }\n\n if (selectedLocation.equals(\"Other\") && finalLocation.isEmpty()) {\n editOtherLocation.setError(\"Please enter your location\");\n return;\n }\n\n // Show loading\n setLoading(true);\n\n // Parse name into first and last name\n String[] nameParts = name.split(\" \", 2);\n String firstName = nameParts[0];\n String lastName = nameParts.length > 1 ? nameParts[1] : \"\";\n\n // Create signup request\n SignupRequest signupRequest = new SignupRequest(firstName, lastName, email, \"000000000\", password);\n signupRequest.setAddress(finalLocation);\n signupRequest.setCity(\"Yaound\u00e9\"); // Default city\n signupRequest.setStreet(finalLocation);\n\n // Make API call\n ApiClient.getApiService().signup(signupRequest).enqueue(new Callback<JwtResponse>() {\n @Override\n public void onResponse(@NonNull Call<JwtResponse> call, @NonNull Response<JwtResponse> response) {\n setLoading(false);\n \n if (response.isSuccessful() && response.body() != null) {\n JwtResponse user = response.body();\n \n // Save user session\n sessionManager.saveUserSession(user);\n \n // Show success message\n Toast.makeText(getContext(), \"Signup successful! Welcome \" + user.getFirstName() + \"! \ud83c\udf89\", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();\n \n // Navigate to dashboard\n Intent intent = new Intent(getActivity(), DashboardActivity.class);\n intent.setFlags(Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK | Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_CLEAR_TASK);\n startActivity(intent);\n \n } else {\n Toast.makeText(getContext(), \"Signup failed. Please try again.\", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();\n }\n }\n\n @Override\n public void onFailure(@NonNull Call<JwtResponse> call, @NonNull Throwable t) {\n setLoading(false);\n Toast.makeText(getContext(), \"Network error: \" + t.getMessage(), Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();\n }\n });\n }\n\n private void setLoading(boolean isLoading) {\n if (isLoading) {\n btnSignUp.setEnabled(false);\n btnSignUp.setText(\"Creating Account...\");\n } else {\n btnSignUp.setEnabled(true);\n btnSignUp.setText(\"Sign Up\");\n }\n }\n}", "old_str_start_line_number_1": 85, "old_str_end_line_number_1": 87}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"Now let me add the performSignup method at the end of the class:

IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "README.md", "file_content": "# WasteReborn - Waste Management System\n\nWasteReborn is a comprehensive waste management system that allows users to book waste pickups, purchase recycled products, and earn points for their environmental contributions. The system includes both an Android mobile app and a Spring Boot backend API.\n\n## Features\n\n### User Features\n- \ud83d\udcf1 **User Authentication** - Secure login and registration\n- \ud83d\uddd1\ufe0f **Waste Pickup Booking** - Schedule waste collection based on street routes\n- \ud83d\uded2 **Recycled Products Marketplace** - Browse and purchase eco-friendly products\n- \ud83c\udfaf **Points Reward System** - Earn 5 points per successful pickup\n- \ud83d\udce6 **Order Tracking** - Track marketplace orders and pickup requests\n- \ud83d\udcca **Personal Dashboard** - View recycling stats and order history\n- \ud83d\udd0d **Search & Filter** - Find products by category or keywords\n- \ud83d\udcac **Chat Bot** - Get help and support\n- \ud83d\udcf1 **Mobile Money Integration** - Pay using Orange Money/Mobile Money\n- \ud83d\udcc8 **Progress Tracking** - Monitor recycling percentage and achievements\n\n### Admin Features\n- \ud83d\udc65 **User Management** - View and manage all users\n- \ud83d\udce6 **Order Management** - Process and track all orders\n- \ud83d\uddd1\ufe0f **Pickup Management** - Assign and track waste pickups\n- \ud83d\udcb0 **Revenue Analytics** - View total revenue and financial reports\n- \ud83d\udecd\ufe0f **Product Management** - Add, edit, and manage recycled products\n- \ud83d\udcca **Dashboard Analytics** - Comprehensive system overview\n\n## Technology Stack\n\n### Backend\n- **Spring Boot 3.2.0** - Main framework\n- **PostgreSQL** - Database\n- **Spring Security + JWT** - Authentication\n- **Spring Data JPA** - Data persistence\n- **Maven** - Dependency management\n\n### Android App\n- **Java** - Programming language\n- **Retrofit 2** - HTTP client\n- **Material Design** - UI components\n- **Glide** - Image loading\n- **SharedPreferences** - Local storage\n\n## Color Scheme\n- **Primary Green** (#2e7d32) - Logo and main buttons\n- **Sky Blue** (#87CEEB) - Accent highlights\n- **Black on White** - Text and background\n\n## Setup Instructions\n\n### Prerequisites\n- Java 17 or higher\n- PostgreSQL 12 or higher\n- Android Studio\n- Maven 3.6 or higher\n\n### Backend Setup\n\n1. **Clone the repository**\n ```bash\n git clone <repository-url>\n cd WasteReborn\n ```\n\n2. **Setup PostgreSQL Database**\n ```sql\n CREATE DATABASE wastereborn_db;\n CREATE USER wastereborn_user WITH PASSWORD 'wastereborn_pass';\n GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON DATABASE wastereborn_db TO wastereborn_user;\n ```\n\n3. **Configure Database Connection**\n Update `backend/src/main/resources/application.yml`:\n ```yaml\n spring:\n datasource:\n url: jdbc:postgresql://localhost:5432/wastereborn_db\n username: wastereborn_user\n password: wastereborn_pass\n ```\n\n4. **Run the Backend**\n ```bash\n cd backend\n mvn spring-boot:run\n ```\n The API will be available at `http://localhost:8080/api`\n\n### Android App Setup\n\n1. **Open in Android Studio**\n - Open Android Studio\n - Select \"Open an existing project\"\n - Navigate to the project root directory\n\n2. **Update API Base URL**\n In `app/src/main/java/com/example/wastereborn/api/ApiClient.java`:\n - For emulator: Use `http://10.0.2.2:8080/api/`\n - For physical device: Use `http://YOUR_COMPUTER_IP:8080/api/`\n\n3. **Build and Run**\n - Connect your Android device or start an emulator\n - Click \"Run\" in Android Studio\n\n## API Endpoints\n\n### Authentication\n- `POST /api/auth/login` - User login\n- `POST /api/auth/signup` - User registration\n- `GET /api/auth/validate` - Validate JWT token\n\n### Products\n- `GET /api/products/public/all` - Get all available products\n- `GET /api/products/public/categories` - Get product categories\n- `GET /api/products/public/search?keyword=` - Search products\n- `POST /api/products` - Create product (Admin only)\n\n### User Management\n- `GET /api/users/profile` - Get user profile\n- `PUT /api/users/profile` - Update user profile\n\n### Orders & Pickups\n- `POST /api/orders` - Create new order\n- `GET /api/orders/user` - Get user orders\n- `POST /api/pickups` - Create pickup request\n- `GET /api/pickups/user` - Get user pickups\n\n## Database Schema\n\n### Key Tables\n- **users** - User accounts and profiles\n- **products** - Recycled products catalog\n- **orders** - Marketplace orders\n- **order_items** - Order line items\n- **pickup_requests** - Waste pickup bookings\n- **notifications** - System notifications\n- **reviews** - User feedback\n\n## Development Roadmap\n\n### Phase 1 \u2705 (Current)\n- Basic authentication system\n- Product marketplace\n- User dashboard\n- Backend API foundation\n\n### Phase 2 \ud83d\udea7 (In Progress)\n- Waste pickup scheduling\n- Points reward system\n- Order tracking\n- Admin panel\n\n### Phase 3 \ud83d\udccb (Planned)\n- Mobile money integration\n- Push notifications\n- Chat bot implementation\n- Advanced analytics\n- Review system\n\n## Contributing\n\n1. Fork the repository\n2. Create a feature branch (`git checkout -b feature/amazing-feature`)\n3. Commit your changes (`git commit -m 'Add some amazing feature'`)\n4. Push to the branch (`git push origin feature/amazing-feature`)\n5. Open a Pull Request\n\n## License\n\nThis project is licensed under the MIT License - see the LICENSE file for details.\n\n## Contact\n\nFor questions or support, please contact the development team.\n\n---\n\n**WasteReborn** - Transforming waste into opportunities for a sustainable future! \ud83c\udf31\u267b\ufe0f"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"Now let's create a README file with setup instructions:

 24	public class CartFragment extends Fragment {
 25	
 26	 private RecyclerView recyclerView;
 27	 private TextView textTotal, textDelivery, textFinalAmount;
 28	 private Button btnCheckout;
 29	 private CartAdapter adapter;
 30	
 31	 private static final int DELIVERY_FEE = 1000;
 32	
 33	 @Nullable
 34	 @Override
 35	 public View onCreateView(@NonNull LayoutInflater inflater,
 36	 @Nullable ViewGroup container,
 37	 @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
 38	
 39	 View view = inflater.inflate(R.layout.fragment_cart, container, false);

 41	 textTotal = view.findViewById(R.id.text_total_price);
 42	 textDelivery = view.findViewById(R.id.text_delivery_fee);
 43	 textFinalAmount = view.findViewById(R.id.text_final_amount);

 45	
 46	 recyclerView.setLayoutManager(new LinearLayoutManager(getContext()));

Confirm your request\\n\\nYou'll earn 5 points for each completed pickup!\";\n } else if (userMessage.contains(\"points\") || userMessage.contains(\"reward\")) {\n return \"Our points system works like this:\\n\u2022 Earn 5 points per completed pickup\\n\u2022 Redeem points for eco-friendly products\\n\u2022 Check your balance in the Rewards tab\\n\u2022 100 points = Premium rewards!\";\n } else if (userMessage.contains(\"product\") || userMessage.contains(\"shop\") || userMessage.contains(\"buy\")) {\n return \"Browse our marketplace for amazing recycled products!\\n\u2022 Eco-friendly bags\\n\u2022 Recycled furniture\\n\u2022 Solar chargers\\n\u2022 And much more!\\n\\nYou can pay with mobile money or use your points.\";\n } else if (userMessage.contains(\"recycle\") || userMessage.contains(\"waste\")) {\n return \"Great recycling tips:\\n\u2022 Separate plastic, paper, and glass\\n\u2022 Clean containers before disposal\\n\u2022 Remove labels when possible\\n\u2022 Electronics need special handling\\n\\nEvery small action helps our planet! \ud83c\udf31\";\n } else if (userMessage.contains(\"help\") || userMessage.contains(\"how\")) {\n return \"I'm here to help! \"You: \" : \"WasteBot: \";\n holder.textMessage.setText(prefix + message.message);\n \n // Style differently for user vs bot\n if (message.isUser) {\n holder.textMessage.setTextAlignment(View.TEXT_ALIGNMENT_TEXT_END);\n holder.textMessage.setBackgroundColor(0xFFE8F5E8);\n } else {\n holder.textMessage.setTextAlignment(View.TEXT_ALIGNMENT_TEXT_START);\n holder.textMessage.setBackgroundColor(0xFFF0F8FF);\n }\n }\n\n @Override\n public int getItemCount() {\n return messages.size();\n }\n\n static class ChatViewHolder extends RecyclerView.ViewHolder {\n TextView textMessage;\n\n ChatViewHolder(View itemView) {\n super(itemView);\n textMessage = itemView.findViewById(android.R.id.text1);\n }\n }\n }\n}", "old_str_start_line_number_1": 1, "old_str_end_line_number_1": 20}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"Here's the result of running `cat -n` on app/src/main/java/com/example/wastereborn/fragments/ChatbotFragment.java:

"file_content": "package com.wastereborn.service;\n\nimport com.wastereborn.model.PickupRequest;\nimport com.wastereborn.model.User;\nimport com.wastereborn.repository.PickupRequestRepository;\nimport org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;\nimport org.springframework.stereotype.Service;\n\nimport java.time.LocalDateTime;\nimport java.util.List;\nimport java.util.Optional;\n\n@Service\npublic class PickupRequestService {\n\n @Autowired\n private PickupRequestRepository pickupRequestRepository;\n\n @Autowired\n private UserService userService;\n\n public List<PickupRequest> getAllPickupRequests() {\n return pickupRequestRepository.findAll();\n }\n\n public List<PickupRequest> getPickupRequestsByUser(User user) {\n return pickupRequestRepository.findByUserOrderByCreatedAtDesc(user);\n }\n\n public List<PickupRequest> getPickupRequestsByStatus(PickupRequest.PickupStatus status) {\n return pickupRequestRepository.findByStatus(status);\n }\n\n public List<PickupRequest> getPendingPickupsByStreet(String street) {\n return pickupRequestRepository.findPendingPickupsByStreet(street);\n }\n\n public Optional<PickupRequest> getPickupRequestById(Long id) {\n return pickupRequestRepository.findById(id);\n }\n\n public PickupRequest createPickupRequest(PickupRequest pickupRequest, User user) {\n pickupRequest.setUser(user);\n pickupRequest.setStatus(PickupRequest.PickupStatus.PENDING);\n return pickupRequestRepository.save(pickupRequest);\n }\n\n public PickupRequest updatePickupRequest(Long id, PickupRequest updatedPickupRequest) {\n PickupRequest pickupRequest = pickupRequestRepository.findById(id)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Pickup request not found\"));\n\n pickupRequest.setPickupAddress(updatedPickupRequest.getPickupAddress());\n pickupRequest.setPickupStreet(updatedPickupRequest.getPickupStreet());\n pickupRequest.setPickupCity(updatedPickupRequest.getPickupCity());\n pickupRequest.setWasteType(updatedPickupRequest.getWasteType());\n pickupRequest.setEstimatedWeight(updatedPickupRequest.getEstimatedWeight());\n pickupRequest.setSpecialInstructions(updatedPickupRequest.getSpecialInstructions());\n pickupRequest.setPreferredPickupDate(updatedPickupRequest.getPreferredPickupDate());\n\n return pickupRequestRepository.save(pickupRequest);\n }\n\n public PickupRequest updatePickupStatus(Long id, PickupRequest.PickupStatus status, User assignedTo) {\n PickupRequest pickupRequest = pickupRequestRepository.findById(id)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Pickup request not found\"));\n\n pickupRequest.setStatus(status);\n \n if (assignedTo != null) {\n pickupRequest.setAssignedTo(assignedTo);\n }\n\n if (status == PickupRequest.PickupStatus.SCHEDULED) {\n // Set scheduled pickup date (could be based on street schedule)\n pickupRequest.setScheduledPickupDate(LocalDateTime.now().plusDays(1));\n } else if (status == PickupRequest.PickupStatus.COMPLETED) {\n pickupRequest.setActualPickupDate(LocalDateTime.now());\n \n // Award points to user (5 points per pickup)\n pickupRequest.setPointsAwarded(5);\n userService.addPoints(pickupRequest.getUser().getId(), 5);\n \n // Update user stats\n userService.updateUserStats(pickupRequest.getUser().getId(), false, true);\n }\n\n return pickupRequestRepository.save(pickupRequest);\n }\n\n public void deletePickupRequest(Long id) {\n pickupRequestRepository.deleteById(id);\n }\n\n public List<PickupRequest> getPickupRequestsByDateRange(LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end) {\n return pickupRequestRepository.findByScheduledPickupDateBetween(start, end);\n }\n\n public List<PickupRequest> getActivePickupsByAssignee(User assignee) {\n return pickupRequestRepository.findActivePickupsByAssignee(assignee);\n }\n\n public Long getCompletedPickupsCountByUser(User user) {\n return pickupRequestRepository.countCompletedPickupsByUser(user);\n }\n\n public PickupRequest schedulePickup(Long id, LocalDateTime scheduledDate, User assignedTo) {\n PickupRequest pickupRequest = pickupRequestRepository.findById(id)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Pickup request not found\"));\n\n pickupRequest.setStatus(PickupRequest.PickupStatus.SCHEDULED);\n pickupRequest.setScheduledPickupDate(scheduledDate);\n pickupRequest.setAssignedTo(assignedTo);\n\n return pickupRequestRepository.save(pickupRequest);\n }\n\n public PickupRequest addPickupNotes(Long id, String notes) {\n PickupRequest pickupRequest = pickupRequestRepository.findById(id)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Pickup request not found\"));\n\n pickupRequest.setPickupNotes(notes);\n return pickupRequestRepository.save(pickupRequest);\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"Now let's create some additional backend services and controllers. "file_content": "package com.wastereborn.controller;\n\nimport com.wastereborn.model.PickupRequest;\nimport com.wastereborn.model.User;\nimport com.wastereborn.service.PickupRequestService;\nimport com.wastereborn.service.UserService;\nimport org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;\nimport org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;\nimport org.springframework.security.access.prepost.PreAuthorize;\nimport org.springframework.security.core.Authentication;\nimport org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.*;\n\nimport java.time.LocalDateTime;\nimport java.util.List;\n\n@RestController\n@RequestMapping(\"/pickups\")\n@CrossOrigin(origins = \"*\", maxAge = 3600)\npublic class PickupController {\n\n @Autowired\n private PickupRequestService pickupRequestService;\n\n @Autowired\n private UserService userService;\n\n @GetMapping(\"/user\")\n public ResponseEntity<List<PickupRequest>> getUserPickups(Authentication authentication) {\n User user = userService.findByEmail(authentication.getName())\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"User not found\"));\n \n List<PickupRequest> pickups = pickupRequestService.getPickupRequestsByUser(user);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(pickups);\n }\n\n @GetMapping(\"/{id}\")\n public ResponseEntity<PickupRequest> getPickupById(@PathVariable Long id, Authentication authentication) {\n PickupRequest pickup = pickupRequestService.getPickupRequestById(id)\n .orElse(null);\n \n if (pickup == null) {\n return ResponseEntity.notFound().build();\n }\n \n User user = userService.findByEmail(authentication.getName())\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"User not found\"));\n \n // Check if user owns this pickup or is admin\n if (!pickup.getUser().getId().equals(user.getId()) && !user.getRole().equals(User.Role.ADMIN)) {\n return ResponseEntity.forbidden().build();\n }\n \n return ResponseEntity.ok(pickup);\n }\n\n @PostMapping\n public ResponseEntity<PickupRequest> createPickupRequest(@RequestBody PickupRequestDto pickupRequestDto, \n Authentication authentication) {\n User user = userService.findByEmail(authentication.getName())\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"User not found\"));\n \n PickupRequest pickupRequest = new PickupRequest();\n pickupRequest.setPickupAddress(pickupRequestDto.getPickupAddress());\n pickupRequest.setPickupStreet(pickupRequestDto.getPickupStreet());\n pickupRequest.setPickupCity(pickupRequestDto.getPickupCity());\n pickupRequest.setWasteType(pickupRequestDto.getWasteType());\n pickupRequest.setEstimatedWeight(pickupRequestDto.getEstimatedWeight());\n pickupRequest.setSpecialInstructions(pickupRequestDto.getSpecialInstructions());\n \n // Set preferred pickup date (could be parsed from slot info)\n pickupRequest.setPreferredPickupDate(LocalDateTime.now().plusDays(1));\n \n PickupRequest createdPickup = pickupRequestService.createPickupRequest(pickupRequest, user);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(createdPickup);\n }\n\n @PutMapping(\"/{id}\")\n public ResponseEntity<PickupRequest> updatePickupRequest(@PathVariable Long id, \n @RequestBody PickupRequestDto pickupRequestDto,\n Authentication authentication) {\n PickupRequest existingPickup = pickupRequestService.getPickupRequestById(id)\n .orElse(null);\n \n if (existingPickup == null) {\n return ResponseEntity.notFound().build();\n }\n \n User user = userService.findByEmail(authentication.getName())\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"User not found\"));\n \n // Check if user owns this pickup\n if (!existingPickup.getUser().getId().equals(user.getId())) {\n return ResponseEntity.forbidden().build();\n }\n \n // Only allow updates if pickup is still pending\n if (existingPickup.getStatus() != PickupRequest.PickupStatus.PENDING) {\n return ResponseEntity.badRequest().build();\n }\n \n PickupRequest pickupRequest = new PickupRequest();\n pickupRequest.setPickupAddress(pickupRequestDto.getPickupAddress());\n pickupRequest.setPickupStreet(pickupRequestDto.getPickupStreet());\n pickupRequest.setPickupCity(pickupRequestDto.getPickupCity());\n pickupRequest.setWasteType(pickupRequestDto.getWasteType());\n pickupRequest.setEstimatedWeight(pickupRequestDto.getEstimatedWeight());\n pickupRequest.setSpecialInstructions(pickupRequestDto.getSpecialInstructions());\n \n PickupRequest updatedPickup = pickupRequestService.updatePickupRequest(id, pickupRequest);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(updatedPickup);\n }\n\n @DeleteMapping(\"/{id}\")\n public ResponseEntity<?> deletePickupRequest(@PathVariable Long id, Authentication authentication) {\n PickupRequest existingPickup = pickupRequestService.getPickupRequestById(id)\n .orElse(null);\n \n if (existingPickup == null) {\n return ResponseEntity.notFound().build();\n }\n \n User user = userService.findByEmail(authentication.getName())\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"User not found\"));\n \n // Check if user owns this pickup or is admin\n if (!existingPickup.getUser().getId().equals(user.getId()) && !user.getRole().equals(User.Role.ADMIN)) {\n return ResponseEntity.forbidden().build();\n }\n \n // Only allow deletion if pickup is still pending\n if (existingPickup.getStatus() != PickupRequest.PickupStatus.PENDING) {\n return ResponseEntity.badRequest().build();\n }\n \n pickupRequestService.deletePickupRequest(id);\n return ResponseEntity.ok().build();\n }\n\n // Admin endpoints\n @GetMapping(\"/admin/all\")\n @PreAuthorize(\"hasRole('ADMIN')\")\n public ResponseEntity<List<PickupRequest>> getAllPickups() {\n List<PickupRequest> pickups = pickupRequestService.getAllPickupRequests();\n return ResponseEntity.ok(pickups);\n }\n\n @GetMapping(\"/admin/status/{status}\")\n @PreAuthorize(\"hasRole('ADMIN')\")\n public ResponseEntity<List<PickupRequest>> getPickupsByStatus(@PathVariable String status) {\n try {\n PickupRequest.PickupStatus pickupStatus = PickupRequest.PickupStatus.valueOf(status.toUpperCase());\n List<PickupRequest> pickups = pickupRequestService.getPickupRequestsByStatus(pickupStatus);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(pickups);\n } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {\n return ResponseEntity.badRequest().build();\n }\n }\n\n @PutMapping(\"/admin/{id}/status\")\n @PreAuthorize(\"hasRole('ADMIN')\")\n public ResponseEntity<PickupRequest> updatePickupStatus(@PathVariable Long id, \n @RequestParam String status,\n @RequestParam(required = false) Long assignedToId) {\n try {\n PickupRequest.PickupStatus pickupStatus = PickupRequest.PickupStatus.valueOf(status.toUpperCase());\n \n User assignedTo = null;\n if (assignedToId != null) {\n assignedTo = userService.findById(assignedToId)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Assigned user not found\"));\n }\n \n PickupRequest updatedPickup = pickupRequestService.updatePickupStatus(id, pickupStatus, assignedTo);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(updatedPickup);\n } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {\n return ResponseEntity.badRequest().build();\n } catch (RuntimeException e) {\n return ResponseEntity.notFound().build();\n }\n }\n\n @GetMapping(\"/admin/street/{street}\")\n @PreAuthorize(\"hasRole('ADMIN')\")\n public ResponseEntity<List<PickupRequest>> getPendingPickupsByStreet(@PathVariable String street) {\n List<PickupRequest> pickups = pickupRequestService.getPendingPickupsByStreet(street);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(pickups);\n }\n\n // DTO class for pickup request data\n public static class PickupRequestDto {\n private String pickupAddress;\n private String pickupStreet;\n private String pickupCity;\n private String wasteType;\n private Double estimatedWeight;\n private String specialInstructions;\n\n // Getters and setters\n public String getPickupAddress() { return pickupAddress; }\n public void setPickupAddress(String pickupAddress) { this.pickupAddress = pickupAddress; }\n\n public String getPickupStreet() { return pickupStreet; }\n public void setPickupStreet(String pickupStreet) { this.pickupStreet = pickupStreet; }\n\n public String getPickupCity() { return pickupCity; }\n public void setPickupCity(String pickupCity) { this.pickupCity = pickupCity; }\n\n public String getWasteType() { return wasteType; }\n public void setWasteType(String wasteType) { this.wasteType = wasteType; }\n\n public Double getEstimatedWeight() { return estimatedWeight; }\n public void setEstimatedWeight(Double estimatedWeight) { this.estimatedWeight = estimatedWeight; }\n\n public String getSpecialInstructions() { return specialInstructions; }\n public void setSpecialInstructions(String specialInstructions) { this.specialInstructions = specialInstructions; }\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File
